title: Harbona
content:
HARBONA

One of King Ahasuerusâ€™s seven personal servants. Ahasuerus (also called Xerxes) ordered them to parade Queen Vashti before a drunken feast so everyone could see her beauty (Esther 1:10). Harbona later suggested that Haman be hanged using the gallows Haman had built to execute Mordecai (Esther 7:9).
